biotools.summary:
Enhanced prediction of gene and missense rare-variant pathogenicity by joint analysis of gene burden and amino-acid residue position.

Rare variant association using position and burden signals.

This method is designed for case-control studies where the condition under investigation is caused by rare variants in protein-coding regions. This is the case for most Mendelian diseases and therefore this method is relevant for these

bioschemas.name: ClusterBurden
